Class Cinema

  • java.lang.Object
    • Cinema

  • public class Cinema
extends java.lang.Object
    Cinema Class The main implementation class for the system. The Cinema class stores all the objects for the application

        public boolean isValidShow(java.util.Calendar date,
                           Screen screen,
                           Film film)

        Parameters:

        screen - Screen

      • addReview

        public void addReview(Ticket ticket,
                      java.lang.String review,
                      int rating)
        addReview Add new Review The review cannot be overwritten. This method first checks to see if the review is null. If the review is not null, it does not log the review
        Parameters:
        ticket - Ticket
        review - String
        rating - int

      • getSeatingGrid

        public boolean[][] getSeatingGrid(Show show)
        getSeatingGrid Get the seating grid for the show True represents a seat that has been booked. False represents a seat that is available.

        Returns:
        boolean[][]

      • convertToRowLetter

        public java.lang.String convertToRowLetter(int rowInt)
        convertToRowLetter Convert row int to row letter Convert int 1-5 to A-E. If int out of range, return string with single white space
        Parameters:
        rowInt - int
        Returns:
        String rowLetter

        Returns:
        int
